# Find the two entries that sum to 2020

::: {.notes}
Slide 9 / 40
:::

# My Solution

```{r, echo=TRUE, eval=FALSE}
input <- as.numeric(readLines("01-input"))

sum2 <- function(input, target) {
  for (i in input) for (j in input) if (i + j == target) return(i * j)
}

sum2(input, 2020)
```
